CAPTION FIG1.png: "Figure 1. Example of visual analogy graphics for instructions that compare A) Earth's convection currents and plate movement to a boiling pot of water and B) Earth's layers to the layers of a Peach.\n\n"
CAPTION FIG2.png: "Figure 2. Example mapping assessment: the students' task was to draw arrows between parts of the base domain and the target domain and to specify how each part was similar.\n\n"
CAPTION FIG3.png: 'Figure 3. Results of pre- and post-tests by condition in A) \\(5^{\\rm th}\\) graders and B) \\(4^{\\rm th}\\) graders.\n\n'
CAPTION FIG4.png: 'Figure 4. Results of the extended post-tests by grade and condition.\n\n'
